alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:33PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Aitkin, northwestern Pine, western Carlton and southeastern Crow Wing Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1133 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Aitkin, to 9 miles west of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, to near Mille Lacs Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area around 1145 PM CDT. Big Sandy Lake and McGregor around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kettle River and Tamarack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin
